name: Premium Programmable Coffee Maker
description: 12-cup programmable coffee maker with thermal carafe, auto-brew timer, and brew strength selector. Wake up to fresh coffee every morning.

name: Smart Robot Vacuum Cleaner
description: Intelligent robot vacuum with LiDAR navigation, app control, scheduling, and self-charging. Perfect for automated floor cleaning.

name: Digital Air Fryer 5.8QT
description: Large-capacity air fryer with digital controls, 8 preset cooking programs, and rapid air circulation for healthier cooking with less oil.

name: Luxury Egyptian Cotton Bedding Set
description: Premium 1000-thread count Egyptian cotton sheet set with deep pockets, sateen weave, and elegant embroidery. Queen size includes flat sheet, fitted sheet, and 2 pillowcases.

name: LED Desk Lamp with Wireless Charging
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness, color temperature control, USB charging port, and built-in wireless charging pad.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof wireless speaker with 360-degree sound, 12-hour battery life, and built-in microphone. Perfect for outdoor use.

name: Decorative Wall Mirror Set of 3
description: Elegant set of 3 round mirrors with thin gold frames. Various sizes create an eye-catching wall display for any room.

name: Set of 3 Ceramic Plant Pots
description: Modern ceramic planters with drainage holes and matching saucers. Includes small, medium, and large sizes for various plants.
